full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 UNDER DOCKET CONTROL AT LOS UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration & Naturalization Service 300 North Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 NOTICE OF DEPORTATION PROCEEDINGS Date: August 2, 1972 File No. : Sr y Sra Silverio BARRIOS Y NINOS A19 915 239 DEP/LOS 325 Juliana Street 915 238 Anaheim, California, FOIA (b)(6) 1. Your departure from the United States is required to be effected on or before August 15, 1972 2. You are urged to avail yourself of the voluntary departure privilege in order to avoid possible deportation which would preclude any later attempt to return. To avail yourself of this privilege you must: (a) Notify this office (688- ) of the date and manner of your departure at least two days in advance of such departure. (b) Surrender this notice and the attachment to the immigration officer at a land border port, or to the agent of the transportation line on which you depart the United States. 3. In the event you fail to depart the United States on or before the date mentioned above, you will be an alien illegally in the United States as one who remained longer than permitted by law, and you must report to Room 8024 for your deportation proceeding at 9:00 A.M. on August 16, 1972 4. Should you fail to depart the United States and also fail to appear for your deportation proceeding, a warrant for your arrest will be issued. George K. Rosenberg District Director LVD/ue DEP. - I-210 UNDER DOCKET CONTROL AT LOS
